item.title: US says Guantanamo inmate sent back to Tunisia
item.description: The repatriation of Ridah Bin Saleh al-Yazidi means 26 detainees remain at the detention facility.

item.title: Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt reach divorce deal
item.description: The Hollywood stars reached a divorce settlement after eight years, her lawyer tells media.

item.title: Two men found dead while searching for Bigfoot
item.description: Officials started searching for the pair on Christmas after a relative reported them missing.

item.title: Chai with Bill Gates, Ambani wedding and other 2024 viral moments from India
item.description: From a viral tea moment to chess glory, a long wedding and popcorn tax - Indian social media had plenty to offer in 2024.

item.title: Madoff fraud victims get $4.3bn as fund completes payouts
item.description: Victims of one of the biggest frauds in US history set to recover more than 90% of proven losses.
